title: xentertainer
author: xentertainer
content: This is would be our first post here in BitcoinTalk.And we would like to promote our business here. We are group of dealers in Germany - Switzerland.We are selling Pre-Owned Rolex. And we accept Crypto Only.We started this business last year 2022.We Currently sold 45 Rolex So far.Please Visit our website for more information: https://www.xentertainer.siteAuthenticityAll listed watches are 100% genuine timepieces.Absolutely new & unworn (if not marked as pre-owned), with valid and activated manufacturer warranty, with factory stickers, with full documentation (e.g. warranty card or certificate stamped from AD) and, of course, with original box.Don't worry, there is absolutely no catch.ShippingTo ensure utmost security for our customers, the items get shipped from the dealerships to our storage first to undergo a quality control by our watchmakers team.After the quality approval, we ship worldwide with DHL, FedEx and UPS (depends on the destination) from our logistics hubs based in the EU.Always with full insurance, security bag and tracking number.PaymentWe accept BTC, BNB, LTC, DASH, DOGE, TRX and XMR* currently.Payment processing powered by Plisio. Would love to add Coinpayments if needed.PrivacyWe respect your privacy and really care about it.Your contact information is safe with us - we never share personal data with third parties. Your delivery address and personal data are used only to ensure a successful delivery process. Your email address is only saved for delivery status updates and exclusive offers.The browser data, operating system and monitor size is analysed anonymously only to allow us to adjust our site for a better visual experience.

comments.author: SFR10
comments.body: Quote from: xentertainer on January 05, 2023, 10:14:52 PMWe started this business last year 2022.May I know what made you change your "adult platform" into one that sells pre-owned watches [quite strange]?!Quote from: xentertainer on January 05, 2023, 10:14:52 PMWe Currently sold 45 Rolex So far.Can you back this up with something?- I already tried to look for reviews, but I had no luck finding a real one!

comments.author: kirya
comments.body: I wonder how many people buy luxury things with crypto today?

comments.author: Pmalek
comments.body: Quote from: xentertainer on January 05, 2023, 10:14:52 PMAbsolutely new & unworn (if not marked as pre-owned Does the main business revolve around selling pre-owned or new Rolexes? I am asking because your first paragraph mentions pre-owned watches, but the sentence I quoted makes it sound like you are dealing with new Rolexes and only some of them are pre-owned.Quote from: xentertainer on January 05, 2023, 10:14:52 PMTo ensure utmost security for our customers, the items get shipped from the dealerships to our storage first to undergo a quality control by our watchmakers team. With all due respect, this doesn't make much sense for the buyer. Why would I trust your quality control team? You are the one selling those watches. Your staff and partners surely won't say the quality is bad or that the watch isn't genuine. Quality control and assessment should be carried out by neutral parties.

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: Pmalek on June 17, 2024, 08:54:00 AMWith all due respect, this doesn't make much sense for the buyer. Why would I trust your quality control team? You are the one selling those watches. Your staff and partners surely won't say the quality is bad or that the watch isn't genuine. Quality control and assessment should be carried out by neutral parties. After opening this topic, the OP did not appear here again for a year and a half, it is certain that he is not interested in further discussion here. These two Newbies who are doing necrobumps are just plain spammers, we shouldn't pay attention to them. Maybe the moderators could close such topics.
